articles.title: Trump loses bid to toss hush money conviction on immunity grounds - Reuters
articles.description: Donald Trump on Monday lost a bid to overturn his criminal conviction stemming from hush money paid to a porn star in light of the U.S. Supreme Court's July ruling recognizing immunity from prosecution for a president's official acts.
